comments.comment:
Mr Nagananda!

Who are you?
Where are you from? Where do you live?
What about your family? Who are they? Where are they? 
Have you lived in a foreign country? Have you been a resident or citizen of a foreign country?
Have you any alliance with any political  parties abroad? 
Are you or were you ever a member of any NGO or international organization? 
Do you have any affiliations with any political parties in Sri Lanka? 
Are you close to any political party or political leader of any local political party? 

These are concerns the Sri Lankan public have about you who appeared from nowhere and trying to contest the presidential elections. It might be worthwhile for you to clarify ALL these suspicions!
comments.author: Dev De Silva

comments.comment: I am fed up with this drama now Naga. you tell the same story time and time again.I have been following you and advocating you like nothing.as far as I understand you are not prepared to answer certain questions.in that program "Face the Nation" you were tripping over your message to share¬†at least the names of those 06 professionals (out of 20). when the mediator asked about "how do you develop the country" - you were repeating the same old same story and started beating around the bush. you were all over the place and very vague in answering most of the questions. you said you are planning to raise the GDP by few folds but when the presenter asked by how many folds, you started struggling to specify that. to say the least you struggled answering to the points rather than telling some rubbish. I am afraid, to tell you honestly slowly but steadily you are losing the grip over your voter base. Now I, myself¬†am thinking twice whether to vote for you or not.
comments.author: Janitha Jayasinghe

replies.replyComment:
Aravinda Fernando - I do agree with you on the point that he doesn‚Äôt answer the questions in simple and concise manner without highlighting the same point of ‚Äúimportance of re-establishing the rule of the law in the country‚Äù. YES the the rule of the law and law and order are two most important pillars but he has to make sure that he interrelates the same with other key areas smartly when answering such questions. In simple terms one will never have to be an expert to answer a question but conversant with the same. 

I am afraid, I am not in a position to agree with you on other points at all. On fluency in English - I doesn‚Äôt play a role in becoming a true leader, does it? (Naga is not a native speaker and even native speakers make mistakes. How many of Sinhalese can write an essay grammatically?). Of course his USP is honestly which cannot be challenged by anyone. There is no doubt about it. He had been accused of some charges but has eventually been acquitted of all allegations (if you have been following him closely, you might have already seen the clips in which he explains the said issue to the public with proof to substantiate that he was just a victim of a well planned plot). On the family and citizenship - he had to resort to leaving for the UK for asylum. 

On his team - I am also worried about  the way in which he handles the subject of his team and hence of the feeling that he has no proper team.

On that horrendous remark of joker in the pack - During last 71 years these two mainstream politicians have been destroying this county making us real jokers and so-called puppets. It seems like you are still struggling to understand who the real jokers in the pack are (none other than lay public) üá±üá∞

Nagananda has too many gaps in his story. He never answers questions. He is not fluent in English, but tells us  he was solicitor in England. He says he is honest, but had a fraud case in customs. He is still a British citizen. His family is in England. He has no team, those few members he mentioned are lost souls. He is the joker in the pack, people are realising that he is  a puppet of  another candidate.

comments.comment:
Let Mr Nagananda build this country together with his fellow citizens with new ideas who can assist him like Sugandika Fernando, Agith Kolonne, Gamini Wijesinghe, Chandima Gomez and many more people with great wisdom who got vision and mission to achieve the desperate objectives of our country

Yes. Intergrity, creditability, loyality, honesty and accountablity is so important. 
These people will maintain the rule of law which is the paramount to develop a country.
A country that upholds the law and order equally to ‚Äòevery citizen‚Äô
The security, agriculture, fishery, education, transport, communication, health and welfare must be brought back to the nation. 

In 1948 SL had a wealth over 1 billion sterling pounds,the richest country in south Asia.
All 225+1 must go. They have had 71 yrs and used their power selfishly to loot and rape this nation openly.

People, Take back your power! Forget about red,blue,green This is the last chance if you want to save this country. 
Do you??? There's no other way. This is Do or Die project. But this is DIY. (Do It Your Self). 
My humble request to the nation is Please DIY. VOTE FOR NAGA!!!!!. 
Print the constitution & Share, inform people.

replies.replyComment: @Indeera Silva Unfortunately,  Jvp has Peraweradi as a party, they brutally punished Sinhala Buddhists in the past during insurgency. They give their valid reasons ofcourse. So all must unite to defeat curruption, bureacrasy and nepotism etc.

Anyone can use most powerful words or fairy tales but practically it is so different. comments.comment: Sri Lanka had paid Rs. 4.44 billion to Wellard Rural Exports Pvt. Ltd.  (Island NewsPaper today) No cows no money either. Whose money is it? When ordinary people have a hand to mouth living the politicians make these payments to fraudulent companies. The money goes into politicians' foreign bank accounts. This is only one fraud I read today.  Do you want to allow this sort of things to happen again? Billions of Rupees they rob can be spent on the Welfare Facilities of the nation. PLEASE SUPPORT NAGANANDA TO CLEAN THE WHOLE SYSTEM.

replies.replyComment: @D D completely agree with you brother.

@P A  We all should pass this true message on social media to combat this "lie", pawn paid by videsa hasthaya, just like few others who seem to be indirectly brainwashing as great lecturers, fortune tellers of different kind and here as social media experts, again coughing for dollars. Do ask friends family to do the same. Dangerous. Their aim is to divide Sinhala votes so that everythimg is diluted and reduce to a no majority government, allowing steer to be in sulujatheen controlled by sanhindiya etc etc from outside. Yatathvijitha wahal state kunu bakkiya like now for the videsa hasthaya.ACT

What it shows is this is a person who is not accountable, so far no accounts give to the public  but continues to raise funds directly to his own account and expect us to believe, trust him!
Presents a Vyawastha which is not viable or workable unless there is a rebellion, if not it becomes autocracy!
Then his first task is to remove the Buddhist sacred place in the constitution , for what purpose? Western pawn,ITHTHA.
No team, autocratic one man band. Fails miserably in TV debates showed his inability to produce any factual evidence except showing faults in others work, others plans, other teams; even when ot came to a coalition of Abhiman lanka, he could not sustain harmony too long. What diplomacy! He is a pawn, trying to cause a huge constitutional upheaval and give this country to videsa hasthaya.
No message here, only Banuma garahuma waradda. Vyawastha replacement that 6th grade civic essay that many children produce.
A very dangerous iththek who left Srilanka as an asylum seeker, very peculiar fantastical stories, just like hora thelbeheth seller in a village market on motorbike, attracts many but few buyersü§î

@‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑í ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∑í I know am very sorry, to date I haven't found a sinhala keyborad that serves well for  my huge extensive vocabulary,  have to use alapilla papilla etc still do not convey the exact meaning most of the time thus you have to bear with me for the time being.üëàüôà
Api oi oba kiyanade niyama tathwe newe. Attatama adatath e mulika desapalana mathyan wenas wela na mokada essence of those ideas, thoughts, practices remian the same in pure form. Wela thiyenne technological advances nisa lokaya lanwela, anik athin modern nathnam nuthana wela kiyanne yatharthaya misak mathyan mathbedayan wala mulika karunu ewamai namut ada api SADARANEEKARANAYA karanna yoda ganno me naweena loketa kiya.
JR ta oi taram loku thanakdimama anuwanai neda? Jvp monawada mulika prathipaththi dan? 
Ada godak jvp aya ekale inne rata. Oun inneth india newe batahira danapathi arthikaye wagema godak dena business karanawa aithikarayo. Anikaya ounge ilanga parampara pawa sampurnen dhanapathi krame. Ewa apita wadak na paudgalikai kiyamu. Namut ape rate 2015 kare mokakda? Jvp apeksakayek dammanam ada itha shakthimath tatweka inna tibuna parliment eke. JR kiyanne yatathvijithayen apu puruk kalusuddo. 
Ape jathika meheyumak kia deyak tibbanam e dharmapala thuma tibet mahinda thuma wage aya nathuwa anik aya India wage Independence movement ekak genath Gandhi thuma wage avihimsa sathyagraha e ounge culture ekata awenika nidahas satanak genagiye na JANABALAYAK ekka. 
Ape minissu ekai adatath me mokakda karanne mekada prajathanthrawadee satana nathnam mathiwarana? Ara Nagananda kia ayek avith apeksakayekwenne diaspora funds walin! 
Kiyatawath dinanna newe sinhalaya bedanna.
Ltte kohomada diaspora visa game. Ape lankawen yana asylum seekers moko serama oi batahirata yanne?! Wadidena mona hethu hari kiyala visa ganna. Oka oba kiyawanna. Ltte jvp ha noyekut anik lankikayo kiyapu hethu e batahira vishlesakayo kiyano  "fantastic stories" kiyala!  Namut e ratawal walta ona minissu. Tax gewana janathawak weno.
JR karapuwa nisa jvp goda enna bari na. JR godak waradi kara eka wenai.
Api, maha janathawa aththa niwahal nidahas satanaka yedila na eka danne na enisa prajathantrawadaye agaya danne na. Chande dunne ekale hal seruwata passe job ekata, ilangata idamata dan samurdiyata petti gekata ohoma kiyan yathaki.
Awankawama 2009 passe janathawa rata gana kakkumak athiwa jande dunna wadakarana janathawa oppressed janathwa namut SOCIAL MEDIA mada panthiya noyek nam kiyan adath viyath kiyai tharuna kiyai naweena kiyai yatharthaya kiyai. Eyalama panthiyak hadan eyalata. Ekai ada jvp eke katha tatwe.
Oun samanya eda eda rate wadakarana janaya ekkada?
Owata JR ho wena kauruth pali na.
Bro balanna india Modi ta oi mokada ohoma balaya? Issara Gandhi lata namut oun pasukaleka ara panthikramema digata genagiya, mulin janaya hitiye ewa nodana newe namuth oungema ananyathawak nayakayinuth piligath nisa. Namut passe passe oun wenama panthiyak lesa wenama hasirim jeewana rata geniyanne ada oun paradila desapalanaye.
Ewai jathiwadaya kiyala UN mulut karanoda? Batahira pana pana red carpet dagena Modi ta ada!
Okai yatharthaya. 
Dan ape ratata thiyenne me api api petty kulalkaganim newe.
Ape rata hamapaththenma sampath akramanayak sulujatheen gahano maha jathiyata mothers la pawa wandakarano daru parampara athiweem kadano.
Kallathoni padinchi karawano
Mewata jvp ekath parliament eke indan indirectly ho directly akramanyai.
Ekai warada. Unp ekka ho nathiwa.
Eka mona vidiyewath prathipattiyak newe opportunistic awasthawadi pirisak wela.
Ada Handunneththi COPE kamituwe yam wadagath kriyawak karano ekata loku sathutak pahadimak athiweno namut eth madi.
Prajathanthrawadayak kriyathmaka wenna me ape wags opportunistic mada panthiyak nagarika voice ekak tamath yatathvijitha kalusuddo lokutan walta sthapitha karan pitaratata duwana rate waradi judiciary vivechanaya videsayata baradena rajadrohin eka VIMUKTHIYAK da? 
Kisisethma janatha vimukthiyak newe.

@‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑í ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∑í E kathawa api ehema attention dennaona na namut api big picture eka baluvoth ada jvp ara 1970s wala apu prathipaththi ho samanya wadakarana nathnam oppressed panthiye ho ese athiu ugath parapuraka adarsayak nowe. Ewagema lanka UNP eken control unath nathath ada jvp palanaya unath nathath lokuma balamak wenne ounta dhanawadi pelanthitema sadaraneekarana paddathiyak mathin. Ewagema 2015 jvp kare desapremi kriyawak newe apakshakayek noda MR ha ohge nama gama paulata viruddawa giya itha barapathala pawadeemak  pakshikayan. Ita pasu jathiwadaya sanhidiyawa mathin dala oun unp samaga rate aithihasikathwaya mudalata kalusalli kallathoninta plate ekaka thiya dimak une hama vitama unp eka samaga patlimenthu vivada wala pakseeyavimen. Eka unp eken jvp control vimak kia ma dakinnet na oba hari namut ada wenne jvp athkoluwak vima misa idiriyata e oppressed panthiye paksayak e aditan kunu gode yamai athakpathak nathivimai. Eken wenne yam anik paksawalta awasoshanayak neda? Dan e asse videsa hasthayen thani nayakayo hathu pipennawage kalayak rata indala eka sareta national andan me rate kisima desapalana ho thanthrika danumak nathi aya kipadenek sinhala chanda kadanna dala. Eken wenne nawathath me dan wagema majority nathi governance avoth , ekathama regime change wenne, videsa hasthayata ona mokada sulujatheen danwagema vendesiyak wage ounge aniyam balahathkara wada karagena UN ha anikut jyathyantaraya haraha ratama bima damimai. Ada wenne ekai purawasthu wanasanhara kalusalli anthwadi unviversity neethipaddathi etcetc nyananukula ho sadaraneekaranaya kara rata kunu besamak vimai. Adatama nikam ekinekata bana wadunata wadak na itha bayanaka visabeeja athi kunu containers lankawe. Videsa madya nihadai. Videsa ngo s nihadai. Jvp nihadai, akarmanyai.
Ithin unp ekin palanaya una kime athi loku agayak naha namut ada jvp vyaja paksayak tani tani honda pudagalayo hitiya kia bane. Giyawara naluwek lambagoni illa andala chanda ganna baluwa mewa yamkisi wagakim naweena pelena janaya oppressed populous sandaha ena movement ekaka mulikama padanamatama gahana arthkatana. Jvp yanne hora gamanak wela. Dan api mahajanathawa nagisittinna ona jathyantharayen ena akramana ara burumaye weno wage turkey walta weno wage api janathawama accountable wennaona ,vinayath ekka api ada oi ena kaganath itha thadin critical wennaona ape precious aithiya thama vote eka, eka kanyawak wage hamotama aithi  na. Taman control wenna tama vinaya accountable wenna ona. Horu thoran ba. Namut jvp ho ada ena oi aluth udin social media pumbala mathuwena aya kelinma kapadannaona. Ewa balanna deyak na mewara. Mewara ma dakinne api araksawa ona mulinma balanna mokada serama paksa rata yamvidiyaka pawadim karano tamange self interest nisa wagema blackmail unu choura walallak rajinak 1994 indan rata hamadama ayale patau danna yawana tatweta aran. Namut api kata chandaya dunnat ape idiri daru parampara wenuwen e pathwena ayata ona vidiyata me dan wage natanna deela ba. We have to rise up. Ekarashi wela chandayen pasuwath api api vinayanukula samajayaka wadakarana desapremi janathawak hadagannaona. Ekama vikalpaya ekai. Mada gahana balunatto ho ahasa denawa kiyana paksha ha nayakayo ho dan inna yahapalanaya kia apu ena horu ho thoranna deyak na hire innaona aya! üåπüí™üëà‚ù§

@‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑í ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∑í Oppukaranna deyak na. Obathuma kiyawanna Wikileak documents ha anik sectet documents dan out una Julian Assagne, Edward saha tawa kipadenek visin. Ewagema balanna John Pilgar you tube eke. Oi apita kunu containers euwa wage, oi melangadi tama api danne. Africa ratawal ganak dan vinasai virus bacteria roga kawadawath nothibunu.Ohoma rawatunoth, ohoma Nagananda wage eka sareta duwan avith piriwatayak kiya taman serama mulu paulama asylum eka pitarata oun thiyala anungen fundraising kisi accounts apita dila na. Me tamath api akuru danne nathi wahalluwage rawatila ape watina chandaya me nodanna kenekuge kathawata rawatila ara dan inna mathi amathinta krodhayen meya me kawadawath desapalana athdakim nathi regu noladariyekta deela hariyanawada eya thelbeheth wedek wage game brahaspathinda avith yana tarawkarayo dala guna kiyawana, rawayena kaleda thamath? 
Me mahattaya visadumak genath na kisima wada piliwelak team ekak na Vyawasthawa replace karanna ohoma ba eka neethyanukula na. Paramadipathyayen ehema ekal newe ekiyanne vuaeasthawa anuwa swarnajana chanda balaya. Eken api pathkaranne ape palakayo. Vyawasthawe waradak na , e api pathkarana palakayoth neethiyata garu nathi api serama samajayeth tama prasnaya. Favouritism walata tikadenek lokko wela sapaganna taman suddo wage anik aya yatakaran inna me Naga kohomada eya gana kathawa wada ballo denna lokui eyata wada short gahan t shirt me oluwe inne kalusuddek e heene gahala oluwata sirisena unanam apita puluwan kia dapu videsa iththoü§îüåπüëàüí™
